Name: Rioters 2025
About the game: Rioters 2025 its a realistic fps online and offline (AI 16vs16) shooter game. Features: - weapon customization: for now the game contain 6 weapons, but we working to add more soon - character set customization: there is different variety of cloth - Weapon System: you can shoot behind walls , the bullet damage will reduced depend on the material of the wall - AI system: the AI system is very advanced , they can truck by vision and sound - Game mode: you can Choose from two factions (police and rioters ) and play in team death match
Meta Title: Rioters 2025: Jul 16, 2021, DND and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Rioters 2025? Check out the release date (Jul 16, 2021), developer insights from DND, and a complete game summary.
